Top-3 Scripts:
ul_497844: for f in `cut -f1 -d. 497844.txt | sort | uniq`
do
    group=`grep $f.Group 497844.txt`
    fn=`echo $group| cut -f2 -d" "`
    grep ^$f 497844.txt > $fn
done
